value.name: Tech company HostDime breaks ground on headquarters at historic Eatonville site
value.description: After five years of delays, technology company HostDime Inc., broke ground Wednesday on a $35 million data center and headquarters, which will rise on the former grounds of a historic Eatonville school site, east of Interstate 4. “This is just the ...
